name: My Name Is LD-37
description:
This is a Ludum Dare 37 Submission.

A simple and buggy point and click short-story set in One Room

It was supposed to be in 48h, but finished the day after to add decent music and an actual ending. Hope to eventually polish and finish it one day...

Made with phaser

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=124442

Credits:

  • Programming, Art, Story? – Goncalo Monteiro (https://twitter.com/ertaigm)
  • Music – Pedro Matos aka jumperror (https://soundcloud.com/jumperror)
